name: I Wish I Knew
description:
Do you wish to know the game? Wish to play it?

I Wish I Knew is an interactive and click game. You play as Chris, a student and a son that live in a house next to graveyard, is feeling haunted and trying to be brave. What Chris choose will impact something that you wish to know.

Tukang Bakso: Multiple ending

Phasmophobia: Lighting

Sus: 👀

A / Left arrow key: Walk left

D / Right arrow key: Walk right

E: Interact

Left click: Next dialogue

Background

Most of these assets are created by myself. But some are from https://freesvg.org/ .

Character

Characters are created by myself.

Sound

Sounds are from https://freesound.org/ .

Add-on

Add-on for dialog logic is Dialogic https://dialogic.coppolaemilio.com/ .

Hope you enjoy~
